item.title: State in D3 chart lifecycle
item.description: Integration of D3 data visualizations into front-end applications can be a tricky task, when a plot lifecycle is controlled by the application, sometimes it may be unclear how to properly connect the plot and the application. In this article, I describe some ways to update plots with saving their internal state. Plot internal state When creating a D3 plot to visualize some data it frequently happens that to improve user experience some interactivity should be added.
